*[[AzureWave AW-NB111H]] Wireless LAN Adapter :Broadcom BCM43228 + BCM20702 (BT 4.0) :Subsystem UD: 13d3:3392 - ''ASUS U38N'' :"Broadcom Bluetooth" "bcbtums-win8x64-brcm.inf"
*The FCC photos show the device with a :DC:85:DE Wi-Fi OUI and E0:B9:A5 BT OUI
